Shira Ovide, Wall Street Journal I have no idea whether the Eminem Super Bowl commercial will help sell a single Chrysler 200. But commenting purely as a TV-watching non-Detroiter who watches all car ads through skeptical eyes, I have to say Chrysler positively nailed it with that spot. We were down for a while, she acknowledged. "But guess what? We're back."
